title: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: paneer, tomato, onion, butter, cream, garam masala, chili
steps: Saute onion tomato spices; add paneer and cream.

title: Palak Paneer
ingredients: spinach, paneer, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, spices
steps: Cook spinach; blend; simmer with paneer.

title: Chana Masala
ingredients: chickpeas, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, chili, garam masala
steps: Cook onion tomato; add chickpeas and spices.

title: Aglio e Olio
ingredients: spaghetti, garlic, olive oil, chili flakes, parsley, salt
steps: Cook pasta; toss with garlic oil and chili.

title: Veg Fried Rice
ingredients: rice, carrot, beans, peas, soy sauce, garlic, spring onion
steps: Stir-fry veggies; add rice and sauce.

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: chicken, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, spices
steps: Cook onion tomato; add chicken and simmer.

title: Veg Pulao
ingredients: rice, peas, carrot, beans, cumin, garam masala

title: Tomato Soup
ingredients: tomato, onion, garlic, butter, cream, pepper
steps: Simmer and blend; finish with cream.

title: Masala Omelette
ingredients: egg, onion, tomato, chili, coriander, salt
steps: Beat eggs; cook with masala veggies.

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
ingredients: quinoa, chickpeas, avocado, cucumber, spinach, tahini
steps: Cook quinoa; assemble with veggies and sauce.

title: Tacos
ingredients: tortillas, beans, tomato, lettuce, cheese, salsa
steps: Warm tortillas; fill with beans and toppings.

title: Stir-fry Tofu
ingredients: tofu, broccoli, bell pepper, soy sauce, garlic, ginger
steps: Stir-fry tofu and veggies; add sauce.
